advancements.story.get_basic_saw.descrip: Use three flint and your crafting table to make a saw, a means to getting better plank yield from logs!
advancements.story.get_basic_saw.title: Sawing and Slicing
advancements.story.get_bone_knife.descri: Use a bone shard to craft a knife.
advancements.story.get_bone_knife.title: Let Me See What You Have
advancements.story.get_bone_pickaxe.desc: Use a bone shard to craft a pickaxe capable of mining iron!
advancements.story.get_bone.description: Kill a passive animal or skeleton to get bones
advancements.story.get_bone.title: BONE?!
advancements.story.get_crafting_table.de: Finally, make yourself a crafting table!
advancements.story.get_flint_hatchet.des: Using three flint and a stick (from leaves), craft a flint hatchet
advancements.story.get_flint.description: Hold at least one of any pebble in both hands and hold down right click until you get flint!
advancements.story.get_flint.title: Taking a Knap
advancements.story.get_improved_saw.desc: Craft a better saw using 3 iron and 3 sticks - this saw is more durable!
advancements.story.get_planks.descriptio: Using your hatchet, strip your logs then use them to craft a plank!
advancements.story.get_planks.title: Acquire Planks
advancements.story.knap_bone_shard.descr: Knap bone shards with a bone in one hand and flint in another
advancements.story.knap_bone_shard.title: Sharp Enough to Mine!
advancements.story.mine_pebble.descripti: You can right-click them to harvest too!
advancements.story.mine_pebble.title: Grab a Pebble
itemGroup.natprog.name: Natural Progression
natprog.broken.bones: %s broke too many bones punching stone
natprog.stone.warning: §4You cannot break hard blocks without a pickaxe.§r
natprog.wood.warning: §4You cannot break wooden blocks without an axe.§r
